products.title: Scandi Birds, Mustard - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporating the fashionable colour scheme of grey and yellow, the scandi birds in mustard is home to sweet birds in a two-tonal grey, with the deep yellow shade forming the base. The canvas fabric is lightweight and agile, so it forms the roman curves with ease. Settle for a trendy look in your living room by using the mustard to inspire a contemporary but cutesy vibe. Choose white or stone grey walls as a base, and match the sofas to the blinds, using soft grey upholstery or throws.

products.title: Superstar, Paintbox - Roman Blind
products.description: Bring your home to life with the vivid shades of the superstar paintbox, a fun blind that covers a blank white canvas with a multicoloured array of sweet star shapes. The eclectic colour combination will sit nicely in the classic roman shape, forming a playful take on a soft, traditional blind. Make space for the paintbox in a child's bedroom or playroom, where they'll simply love counting the stars and seeing how many colours they can find in the fabric.

products.title: Bird Garden, Canvas - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the enchanting bird garden canvas into your dcor for a sophisticated look with charming detail, where a soft, cotton-like fabric hosts a display of feathered friends and creative foliage in soothing white on a mild oatmeal background. Display the canvas amid layers of splendid linen in harmonising caramel and biscuit shades, framing the blind with honeyed fabrics and complementing colours.

products.title: Mallard, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For some classic country charm, look no further than the mallard natural. A pretty oatmeal background hosts beautifully painted ducks in charming shades of brown and green, accentuated by a pattern of white spots to finish the piece. Give your kitchen some farmyard appeal by hanging this country-style blind amidst plenty of natural woods, neutrally toned walls and units, and classic country shades of green and cream.

products.title: Heathland, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: Create a soothing and comforting area of the home by using neutral tones, where the oatmeal base of the heathland linen blind is perfect for crafting a subtle colour scheme, whilst the distinctive dove and shrubbery print adds a pinch of charming character. Combine the linen with flattering tones of taupe, caramel, and cream to generate a tranquil and comforting effect, adding hints of personality by including delicate woodland prints and opulent fabrics.

products.title: Tulipa, Soft Red - Roman Blind
products.description: Displaying vintage pink, duck egg blue, and plum florals on a bed of ivory cream, the tulipa in soft red is a sweetly sophisticated roman blind that offers both style and substance at every turn. The fabric itself is a smooth and touchable cloth, tightly woven to exude elegance and grace. Show off the soft red in your dining room, settling it against a feature wall in vintage pink or apple green.

products.title: Bergen, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Bang on trend, the bergen in grey mixes a fashionable grey and yellow combo with a totally contemporary take on floral patterning. Think deep mustards, cool stones, and striking slates, tempered by off-white shading as backgrounds for the flowers. The grey would make the perfect addition to a cool and collected office or study, opting for white or lightly toned furniture, and accessorising with pale and slate grey soft furnishings, throwing in the occasional mustard for depth and good measure.

products.title: Artisan Mauve Roman Blind
products.description: The artisan range are beautifully made blinds which give a little kick to any room. It can match any wallpaper in the room even at this astonishing price. This textured purple roman blind is the perfect solution to add colour to anyroom in your home. products.title: Maurice, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and chocolatey, the maurice in chocolate is the height of luxe. This roman blind keeps it simple though, letting its gorgeously textured fabric and rich coffee hue speak for themselves, without pattern or fuss. The neutrality of the chocolate makes it an adaptable buddy for accompanying a wide range of design and colour schemes, so feel free to take your pick when it comes to backdrops and accents.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Champagne - Roman Blind
products.description: Amaze your guests by featuring the lustre in a gorgeous champagne shade in your dcor for a sophisticated and voguish style. Here, a lavish blend of threads form a smooth, velvety cloth for a deluxe blind in an alluring rich shade of champagne and steely hue. Boost your magnolia dcor with glamorous style or simply add sumptuous fabric to an understated room, by including this creamy taupe shade with alike tones of mocha and caramel to create continuity, and similarly lustrous fabrics with graceful sheen for a plush finish.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Adopt an elegant and sophisticated look with the lustre in ivory through its bountiful fabric and tempting, lustrous shade. products.title: Dotty, Rose - Roman Blind
products.description: The delightful dusky pink base to the dotty rose blind is both attractive and charismatic, whilst the nimble and graceful cloth adds a casual and relaxed feel. Complete a refined and pretty look by incorporating this charming polka dot into your home. Form an inviting and attractive kitchen by adding subtle shades of colour and delicate patterns, combining with seafoam green, cornflower blue, and gentle lavender for a kitsch-inspired colour scheme, and glossy white furnishings for a refined and classy finish.

products.title: Faux Suede, Dark Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a luxurious and inviting feel in any surrounding with the faux suede in delicious dark chocolate, where a blend of fine threads form a sultry suede effect for a modern blind full of tempting texture and contemporary style. Create a welcoming and cosy living room by complementing the dark chocolate with alike velvety materials and sumptuous linens, incorporating the deep brown hue with similar cocoa tones and caramel hints for a delectable and everlasting palette of dessert-inspired shades.

products.title: Briarfield, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: For a wild but sweet theme, in a home of any age, add the briarfield in blossom, a cream fabric adorned with pretty butterflies in vintage pinks and mint greens. The look is simple yet effective, the dainty illustrations providing colour and depth to a beautifully blank canvas. Offset the graceful design of the blossom by setting it against a pale mint base, adding depth and continuity with throws, cushions, and wall art in creams and dusky pinks.

products.title: Mull, Harvest - Roman Blind
products.description: With its rustic, brick red influence, the mull in harvest brings warming shades to a country style, blending saffron and rusty orange with a nourishing oatmeal base. The soft, twine-like thread might not be the most obvious choice for a blind, yet it works wonderfully, creating a welcoming and comfy feel with its modern checks. Unite the calming and gentle oatmeal backdrop with an alike surrounding of biscuit or cream to forge a sophisticated palette for country checks and tweed-like fabrics, accenting the fiery shades of the blind with terracotta and mustard-hued furnishings.

products.title: Wild Meadow, Magenta - Roman Blind
products.description: Teaming bright fuschia with pretty indigo and sage green, the wild meadow magenta is true to its name, bringing to mind endless fields of wildflowers and grasses. The softness of the roman style only adds to this rural feel, and the fabric is backed with a fade-protective lining to make this blind last. The magenta will work beautifully as part of a traditional bedroom scheme in a country cottage or manor.

products.title: Wild Meadow, Ruby - Roman Blind
products.description: On a stone cream canvas sit dainty wildflower illustrations in whites, mustards, and reds, in the country chic wild meadow ruby. The gentle, flowing feel of the fabric is matched by the drapes of the roman, producing a soft and sumptuous window covering, suitable for any home. Invoke a feeling of rustic rurality in your kitchen by using the ruby to complement sage green and cream surroundings. Accent with mustard yellows and pure whites, with the occasional pop of red, for a coherent and coordinated look.

products.title: Wild Meadow, Charcoal - Roman Blind

The fabric itself is a lightweight, linen-look cloth, creating the perfect plain canvas for this work of art. Temper deeper greys or richer browns in a contemporary living room by hanging the charcoal against a bold feature wall. Use more neutral creams and oatmeals for your sofas and carpets, and choose between brushed silver or tarnished gold for fittings and fixtures.
